uuid.description: Format pattern according to IETF RFC 4122.

date.description: The full-date format pattern according to IETF RFC 3339

duration.description: A string representing duration formatted as defined in ISO 8601. Allowable formats are: P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S, P[n]W, P[n]Y[n]-M[n]-DT[0-23]H[0-59]:M[0-59]:S, and P[n]W, P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[0-23]H[0-59]M[0-59]S. P is mandatory, all other elements are optional, time elements must follow a T.

language-tag.description: Format pattern according to IETF RFC 5646 (language tag).

int64.description: A string instance is valid against this attribute if it contains an integer in the range [-(2**63), (2**63)-1]

uint64.description: A string instance is valid against this attribute if it contains an integer in the range [0, (2**64)-1]
